main event: A bright light, judged to be about 1 inch in diameter, was observed moving steadily from South to North before fading from view in Richmond, Missouri.
interesting points: The observation lasted between 30 seconds to 1 minute,Several witnesses in the area reported seeing the same object,The object was initially perceived as a star-like figure,There was no physical evidence gathered to support the sighting,The report concluded with the possibility of a hoax due to lack of evidence.
sighted object: a bright light moving steadily in the sky
witness description: unknown, one worker in a farm field noticed the object
